input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

samplefile.description: he path to the sample file provided to the pipeline. This is a tab-separated file with one series per line. Each line should contain a series ID and optionally a second column containing a list of sample IDs within the series (if you do not want entire series). These sample IDs are comma-separated but the series ID and list of sample IDs are tab-separated.

sangerID.description: Your Sanger ID i.e user99 (NOT your email).

run_starsolo.description: Boolean variable (true or false) to tell the pipeline whether to run STARsolo on the downloaded fastqs. Default false.

keep_bams.description: Boolean variable (true or false) to tell the pipeline whether to generate BAM files from STARsolo. Default false.

sort_bam_mem.description: The amount of RAM (in BYTES) to use when sorting the BAM file generated from STARsolo. Default is equivalent to 60.GB.
